item.title: SMB Phone System Needs Only Phones
item.description: The simplicity of traditional phone systems, where plugging in a phone provided immediate dial tone, is making a comeback with cloud-based communication systems. This modern approach, known as Hosted VoIP or Hosted PBX, shifts the responsibility of complex switching equipment to a service provider. This means the provider manages updates, maintenance, and scalability, leaving you with only the phones to handle. These aren’t your typical phones; they are IP phones designed for computer networks, using different electrical signals and connectors.
